text: The Temptations are a successful R&B; singing group. They formed in Detroit, USA in 1960. The Temptations have four Billboard Hot 100 number-one singles and 14 Billboard R&B; number-one singles. They have three Grammy Awards. The Temptations were the first Motown act to earn a Grammy Award. ==Other websites== * Category:American boy bands Category:Musical groups from Detroit Category:1960 establishments in the United States Category:1960s establishments in Michigan
title: The Temptations
